actions.name: Actions
actions.description: Lightning Bolt [Cast, 2 (d4) 120' Lines | Reflex] (Recharge Cd4): 21 (6d6) Multi-Attack: 1×Tentacle per (Tentacles) Tentacle [Grapple]: 13 (3d8) and Restrained if smaller

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description: Tentacles: Starts with 8. Targetting one causes a -4 penalty to the Check, but severs it if at least 16 damage is dealt.
